00059 #ifndef HEADER_RC2_H
00060 #define HEADER_RC2_H
00061 
00062 #ifdef OPENSSL_NO_RC2
00063 #error RC2 is disabled.
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #define RC2_ENCRYPT 1
00067 #define RC2_DECRYPT 0
00068 
00069 #include <openssl/opensslconf.h> /* RC2_INT */
00070 #define RC2_BLOCK   8
00071 #define RC2_KEY_LENGTH  16
00072 
00073 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00074 extern "C" {
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 typedef struct rc2_key_st
00078     {
00079     RC2_INT data[64];
00080     } RC2_KEY;
00081 
00082  
00083 void RC2_set_key(RC2_KEY *key, int len, const unsigned char *data,int bits);
00084 void RC2_ecb_encrypt(const unsigned char *in,unsigned char *out,RC2_KEY *key,
00085              int enc);
00086 void RC2_encrypt(unsigned long *data,RC2_KEY *key);
00087 void RC2_decrypt(unsigned long *data,RC2_KEY *key);
00088 void RC2_cbc_encrypt(const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out, long length,
00089     RC2_KEY *ks, unsigned char *iv, int enc);
00090 void RC2_cfb64_encrypt(const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out,
00091                long length, RC2_KEY *schedule, unsigned char *ivec,
00092                int *num, int enc);
00093 void RC2_ofb64_encrypt(const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out,
00094                long length, RC2_KEY *schedule, unsigned char *ivec,
00095                int *num);
